title: @Riot reguarding red baron corki
body: I was just wondering why the heck red baron corki is worth 1820 rp, all it does is change the sound and champ model, it doesn't even compare to the dragon wing corki skin (im pretty sure thats the name) and that skin costs so much less. Will you guys change the price of it in the future or alter the skin in some way? As it really is just a scam for newer players who think that the highest priced corki skin is the best one...{{champion:42}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Red Baron Corki was created before all the good particle effects and skins. If they permanently lower the price now, it kind of screws everyone over who paid for it a few years ago.
That is true though it still doesn't suit it's price and I feel like some people will get cheated out of their rp because of this.

> [{quoted}](name=i mid andi carry,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5YJoQcOx,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-12-19T06:26:05.761+0000)
>
> That is true though it still doesn't suit it's price and I feel like some people will get cheated out of their rp because of this.

probably, but whatcha gonna do
